Ashtabula Bike Club

Ashtabula Bike Club

2024 Bicycle Ride Schedule

Learn More

April Spring Warm Up Rides...

  • April Spring Warm Up Rides start at
  • Austinburg Trailhead of the Western
  • Reserve Greenway Trail in mid April.
  • April, 2, 9, 16, 23, 30: Start at Austinburg Greenway Trailhead for early season warm-ups.
  • Meet Every Tuesday at 6 pm.
  • Wear a helmet.
  • Arrive early for extra miles, and return for 6 p.m. group start.
  • All levels of bicyclers are welcome.
  • Keeping people in sight is a good safety practice.
  • Please buddy up with another rider. We have riders that ride at different speeds. For safety of our riders try and buddy up with someone at your riding level. We do have ride sweeps, but it is nice to have someone with you, in the event of a flat tire or problem.

Join us on Facebook

Join us on Facebook for up to date news on events.

This year ride Schedule

Dates with an asterisk (*) indicate several map choices.

Ride starts promptly at 6:00 pm.

May

  • 7: A-Tech, 1565 State Route 167. Use Garrett Road entrance.
  • 14: Hatches Corners, 5457 Center Road, Conneaut.
  • 21: Rock Creek Metropark area on Rome Rock Creek Road or park at RealAlloy on E. Water St.
  • *25 (Saturday, 10 am): Memorial Day weekend. Bylers Community Kitchen, 400 Ohio 193, 44047.
  • *28: Upper Grand River Metropark, 3199 Cork Cold Springs Road.
  • June
  • 4: Chris and Paul Martello Potluck/picnic Grill, 3699 OH-46, Jefferson.
  • 11: Pierpont Elementary, Ducro Funeral Home, 1071 OH-7.
  • 18: Little Pie Shop & Café, 5050 Lake Road W., Saybrook. Option B map.
  • 25: Hatches Corners start, Watson Garage Map, 5457 Center Road, Conneaut.
  • July
  • 2: Happy Heart’s, 2505 South Ridge, East. Potluck at Frank and Terri’s home after the ride, 3166 Creek Road, Kingsville.
  • *4 (Thursday, 10 am): Jefferson HS, two routes, 207 W Mulberry St, Jefferson.
  • 9: Plymouth Township Road Department, 1002 Plymouth Brick Road (add 5-mile loop).
  • 16: Sheffield VFD, 3636 Sheffield-Monroe Road.
  • 23: D&M (Hunter’s Inn is now the Hey Now), 4536 Footville-Richmond Road, Plymouth, Ohio.
  • 30: 870 Dodgeville Road, Jefferson, Ohio. Joe and Karen Waid’s Potluck.
  • August
  • 6: Dorset Community Center, 2681 OH-193, 44032.
  • 13: White Turkey, 388 E. Main Road, Conneaut, Ohio.
  • 20: Los Venedos, 513 Main Street, Orwell, Ohio.
  • 27: Gangbusters Pizza, 3397 Gageville Monroe Road.

August 31 - Saturday Labor Day Weekend

10:00 AM - Arlene's Route

Picnic at Arlene's following the ride

Start at Jefferson Dog Park

259 E Jefferson Street

Route options: 7, 13, 19, 23 miles

All routes go west out of the park and right onto Hickock.

The short route turns left onto Stumpville.

September 3 - Harpersfield Community Center

Baseball Fields, 5604 Cork-Cold Springs Road

Route options: 5, 10, 20 miles

All routes have challenging hills.

All routes start going west. Left out of the parking lot.

September 10 - State Line United Methodist Church

7321 Bushnell

Route options: 8, 10, 18, 30, 32 miles

Mostly rolling terrain.

Furnace Road and Middle Road, north of Bushnell Road, have long gradual inclines.

Start early for longer routes.

September 17 - Eagleville Parking Lot on WRGT

Route options: 7, 14, 18 miles

Option to ride extra miles on WRGT

September 21 - Annual Ferrantes Bike Ride

5585 OH-307, Geneva, Ohio

10:00 AM - Enjoy the end-of-season aromas of the vineyards

Rain date: September 28

Optional lunch following the ride.

September 24 - Red Brook Metropark

4338 Lake Road, Saybrook

Short end-of-season ride through harbor neighborhoods with Lake Erie views.

Picnic and enjoy the rides!
